Device Intelligence




Stop Fraudsters In Their Tracks





Protect your business from fraudsters and linked accounts by continuously analyzing real-time device and behavioral data points to block them – earlier than ever.





Speak with an expert
















Trusted by the World’s Most Ambitious Companies
























































UNMATCHED DEPTH OF REAL-TIME DATA



Detect Unusual Activity




Spot suspicious connections using geolocation, IP and behavioral biometrics like typing patterns and mouse movements to identify legitimate users and detect bots



Cluster device configurations to find duplicate or linked accounts, tracking behavioral inconsistencies that warn of account takeover attempts (ATO)



Monitor on-call status, screen sharing and carriers to detect phishing and block coercion by spotting hesitations or unusual inputs linked to social engineering scams





See the full list of data points







Catch Unusual Device Settings



Expose Hidden Risks 




Flag and block suspicious tools, setups and settings across desktop and mobile devices



Identify high-risk browsers, privacy and location concealment tools – such as Tor, Brave, Linken Sphere and GoLogin – to counter evasion tactics effectively



Detect complex device environments, including virtual machine environments, unusual browser activity and automation tools, to protect your business from sophisticated threats





Learn more about device intelligence







AUTOMATe DECISION MAKING



Stay Ahead Of Emerging Threats




Combine device data and other fraud signals to continuously improve detection accuracy



Fine-tune rules based on your customers’ behavioral and device patterns and specific industry fraud vectors



Use AI to spot bot farms and fraud rings faster than the human eye using device and behavior signals





See how Kolex uses SEON to reduce manual reviews

















Choose How to Integrate with SEON



The choice is up to you: integrate directly with SEON’s APIs or through the AWS Marketplace.




Read the technical docs









Discover How Companies Win











“SEON’s device intelligence immediately showed strong results. When you go to our checkout and press “buy,” SEON gets the device data, scans it and scores it. I also realized it could help with takeovers against fraud rings who have been trying to steal our customer accounts for years.”






Daniel Martinez



Head of Operations, Rebtel





Read story












“We rely on device intelligence to filter out junk users. We immediately saved about 6% of costs on our automated KYC checks.”






Sergey Bogdanov



Chief Risk Officer, Mokka





Read story








See all customer stories






Learn More About Device Intelligence







Article

Filtering Out the Fraudsters: Putting Device Intelligence to Work


Learn how device intelligence detects and prevents fraud using advanced data and behavioral insights. 




Article

What Is Device Fingerprinting and How Does It Work?


Device fingerprinting uses unique device attributes to identify users and detect fraud through hardware, software, and behavior analysis. 




Case study

Mokka Dropped Their Fraud Rates by Over 65%


Mokka used SEON’s device intelligence to cut costs and achieve a 65% fraud reduction, enabling smoother expansion. 




Article

The Dual Path: Boosting Profitability and Security in iGaming 


Advanced fraud prevention and AML solutions boost profitability, prevent abuse, and strengthen iGaming defenses. 




Case study

Oxylabs Blocks Bonus Abuse and Saves 80% Review Time


Oxylabs blocks bonus abusers and cuts manual reviews by 80% with SEON, boosting efficiency without compromising fraud protection. 







Customers Like You Also Use









Digital Footprint Analysis



Using email, phone, and IP data collected during onboarding, SEON crafts a highly detailed digital footprint of each user so you can detect fraudsters before KYC.




Learn more










AML Screening & Monitoring



Keep your business and your revenue safe with anti-fraud and global AML screening, continuous monitoring, and rule-setting capabilities – together in one platform.




Learn more










AI & Machine Learning



Combat evolving threats with adaptive AI that powers fraud prevention and AML compliance. Gain insights with explainable risk signals, clear investigative summaries and intelligent pattern detection.




Learn more















The #1 Fraud Prevention and AML Compliance Solution Loved by Fraud & Risk Teams





With almost 350 reviews, SEON is the market leader and G2’s best fraud prevention solution.









Take the First Step Toward Transformative Fraud Prevention




“SEON significantly enhanced our fraud prevention efficiency, freeing up time and resources for better policies, procedures and rules.”




Chief Compliance Officer, Soft2Bet




Automate 95% of fraud checks



Reduce fraudulent registrations by 90%



Accelerate manual reviews by 90%








Trusted by 5,000+ global organizations:
























Book Time With Our Experts

This cookie notice (“Cookie Notice”) provides you with information on how SEON Technologies Kft. (“SEON” or “we”) and our social media advertising, analytics, etc. partners use cookies on seon.io and docs.seon.io. Cookies. Cookies are small text files that are sent to your device by the browser upon request of the websites. When this notice mentions cookies it should be understood to include similar technologies (e.g. pixel tags, web beacons, local storage, etc.). The cookies that we provide or set on your device while you are visiting our websites are called first party cookies. The cookies that our partners provide or set on your device are third party cookies. Each cookie lasts for a different period of time. Session cookies will last only while your browser is open. When you close the browser, this cookie will be deleted automatically. Persistent cookies will survive even after closing the browser. For example, we will recognize your device via these cookies when you open the browser again. Further information about cookies. Learn more about the purposes of cookies, the duration of the operation of cookies, our social media, advertising, analytics, etc. partners that use cookies on our websites under “Details”. Data collected about you. We and our partners process the cookie ID and related data such as information about your device, the functioning of our website, your preferences etc. Please note that normally we are not able to identify you based on these data, therefore they are normally not considered personal data. If, on the basis of specific circumstances, we are able to identify you based on these data, we inform you that we process your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Notice. Recipients. SEON shares the cookie ID and related data with the following recipients: cloud providers, customer relationship management (CRM) providers, integration tool providers, instant messaging providers, video conferencing tool providers, UI/UX tool providers, social media providers, online advertising platforms and agencies, marketing and analytics tools providers. For further information about our data sharing practices please see our Privacy Notice. Your choices. We use “Functionality and Preferences”, “Personalization and Marketing” and “Statistics” cookies on the basis of you consent. You can at any time, provide, change or withdraw your consent from these cookies under “Details”. Please note that our use of “Necessary” cookies is not subject to your consent, we use them by default, as without these cookies, our website functions requested by you do not work. Device fingerprinting. We use device fingerprinting technology for ensuring information security of our services and for preventing frauds. For further information please see our Privacy Notice. Further information about our privacy practices. Our Privacy Notice complements this Cookie Notice. Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us or our data protection officer, how we process personal data, what  are your rights regarding your personal data, and what are our data protection and privacy practices in our Privacy Notice.   Do not sell or share my personal informationNecessary Cookies Only Allow Selection Customize Accept All Cookies

Financial Services



Protect Your Clients From Fraud at Every Stage




From onboarding to transaction monitoring, SEON reduces your risk exposure and improves your fraud defenses, so you can win and keep your clients’ confidence.





Speak with an expert












Trusted by the World’s Most Ambitious Companies












































RAPID & SECURE ONBOARDING



Reduce Exposure to High-Risk Clients




Block fraudulent sign-ups using suspicious IDs while allowing genuine clients to onboard smoothly



Filter out obvious fraudsters before hard KYC checks with soft KYC screening during onboarding and save costs ahead of time



Combine fraud detection and AML compliance in one platform to speed up the resolution of compliance alerts





Discover three rules for safer digital onboarding







CONTINUOUS MONITORING



Stop Fraudulent Activities & Mitigate Risk




Protect your clients from account takeovers and your organization from fraudulent chargebacks that originate from phishing scams



Monitor clients’ activity in real time to identify and stop account takeovers as they happen



Combine transaction monitoring with behavioral monitoring to detect unusual activities and reduce the risk of money laundering





Find out how to detect account takeover fraud







ADAPTIVE PREVENTION



Enhance Existing Security Infrastructure




Complement security measures with total activity monitoring and velocity rules



Protect against evolving threats that are unique to you by tailoring automated rules to suit your exact needs



Implement AI-generated rules based on customer behaviors that quickly detect anomalies in usage patterns





See how AI & Machine learning can help with fraud detection







ENTERPRISE-GRADE CONTROLS



Robust Security and Access Management




Improve operational efficiency with role-based access controls to ensure the right team members are involved in key decisions



Test, validate and approve custom rules before deployment without disrupting clients



Easily maintain a clear audit trail so you have total oversight of all activity





Explore our top security features

















Choose How to Integrate with SEON



The choice is up to you: integrate directly with SEON’s APIs or through the AWS Marketplace.




Read the technical docs









Discover How Companies Win











“We chose SEON because it offers risk score transparency, which other platforms don’t offer, and because of the custom rules. Granular control is important because we can tailor our risk strategy down to the level of the region or city where our customers sign up from. Implementing SEON has enabled us to achieve a 90.6% auto-approval rate for genuine customers.”






Martina Virgilio



Anti-Financial Crime Manager, HYPE





Read story












”We couldn’t be happier with SEON” concludes Luca. “The numbers in fraud reduction speak for themselves. But the ability to see customer connections is the feature our fraud team uses the most to combat multi-accounting, ATO and overall fraud attempts.”






Luca Giancola



Head of Risk, Anti-Fraud and Payments, Libertex





Read story








See all customer stories






Learn More About Financial Services Fraud







Guide

Collaborative Strategies for Mitigating Fraud Risks in Digital Banking Expansion


Discover how risk assessment, controls, and collaboration help digital banks combat fraud and maintain trust. 




Guide

Onboarding Risk Reduction in Digital Banking


Download our free guide to secure efficient digital bank onboarding and tackle evolving fraud risks. 




Article

What Is Transaction Monitoring in AML & Its Importance


Learn how real-time AML transaction monitoring helps detect suspicious activity. Use automation to boost compliance and cut risk. 




Article

What Is Fraud Detection? Why It Matters & Examples


Explore AI-driven fraud detection, key fraud types, and strategies to choose the right system for real-time protection. 







Customers Like You Also Use









Digital Footprint Analysis



Using email, phone, and IP data collected during onboarding, SEON crafts a highly detailed digital footprint of each user so you can detect fraudsters before KYC.




Learn more










Customer Screening & Monitoring



Keep your business and your revenue safe with anti-fraud and global AML screening, continuous monitoring and rule-setting capabilities – together in one platform.




Learn more










AI & Machine Learning



Combat evolving threats with adaptive AI that powers fraud prevention and AML compliance. Gain insights with explainable risk signals, clear investigative summaries and intelligent pattern detection.




Learn more















Take the First Step Toward Transformative Fraud Prevention




“SEON significantly enhanced our fraud prevention efficiency, freeing up time and resources for better policies, procedures and rules.”




Chief Compliance Officer, Soft2Bet




Automate 95% of fraud checks



Reduce fraudulent registrations by 90%



Accelerate manual reviews by 90%








Trusted by 5,000+ global organizations:
























Book Time With Our Experts

This cookie notice (“Cookie Notice”) provides you with information on how SEON Technologies Kft. (“SEON” or “we”) and our social media advertising, analytics, etc. partners use cookies on seon.io and docs.seon.io. Cookies. Cookies are small text files that are sent to your device by the browser upon request of the websites. When this notice mentions cookies it should be understood to include similar technologies (e.g. pixel tags, web beacons, local storage, etc.). The cookies that we provide or set on your device while you are visiting our websites are called first party cookies. The cookies that our partners provide or set on your device are third party cookies. Each cookie lasts for a different period of time. Session cookies will last only while your browser is open. When you close the browser, this cookie will be deleted automatically. Persistent cookies will survive even after closing the browser. For example, we will recognize your device via these cookies when you open the browser again. Further information about cookies. Learn more about the purposes of cookies, the duration of the operation of cookies, our social media, advertising, analytics, etc. partners that use cookies on our websites under “Details”. Data collected about you. We and our partners process the cookie ID and related data such as information about your device, the functioning of our website, your preferences etc. Please note that normally we are not able to identify you based on these data, therefore they are normally not considered personal data. If, on the basis of specific circumstances, we are able to identify you based on these data, we inform you that we process your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Notice. Recipients. SEON shares the cookie ID and related data with the following recipients: cloud providers, customer relationship management (CRM) providers, integration tool providers, instant messaging providers, video conferencing tool providers, UI/UX tool providers, social media providers, online advertising platforms and agencies, marketing and analytics tools providers. For further information about our data sharing practices please see our Privacy Notice. Your choices. We use “Functionality and Preferences”, “Personalization and Marketing” and “Statistics” cookies on the basis of you consent. You can at any time, provide, change or withdraw your consent from these cookies under “Details”. Please note that our use of “Necessary” cookies is not subject to your consent, we use them by default, as without these cookies, our website functions requested by you do not work. Device fingerprinting. We use device fingerprinting technology for ensuring information security of our services and for preventing frauds. For further information please see our Privacy Notice. Further information about our privacy practices. Our Privacy Notice complements this Cookie Notice. Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us or our data protection officer, how we process personal data, what  are your rights regarding your personal data, and what are our data protection and privacy practices in our Privacy Notice.   Do not sell or share my personal informationNecessary Cookies Only Allow Selection Customize Accept All Cookies

Login & Activity Monitoring




Protect Your Customers





You can’t stop customers from falling for social engineering attacks, but you can help keep them – and your business – safe through login and activity monitoring.





Speak with an expert






Prevent Fraud Losses




Monitor and analyze a high volume of user behavior to quickly spot suspicious login attempts and account activity at scale



Recognize recurring patterns to detect account takeovers, phishing and social engineering attacks



Block stolen card transactions so you can avoid fraudulent chargebacks to protect your customers and your bottom line





How you can stop account takeover fraud







Easily Filter Out Bad Activity




Quickly identify fraudsters by tracking unusual activity in real time across desktop and mobile devices



Continuously monitor thousands of device and behavioral signals to spot fraudulent patterns at scale using AI



Get fraud alerts paired with rich context to make manual investigations faster and easier to escalate or close out





How device signals boost fraud defenses







Automate Your Defenses to Boost Detection Efficiency




Easily customize risk scores to your specific thresholds and business requirements to keep customers’ accounts safe



Set velocity checks to stop brute login attempts and high-volume account takeovers



Reduce the time, effort and costs associated with manual reviews by automating routine checks





See how Kolex slashed manual reviews by 90%








Discover How Companies Win











“Setting up rules is easy. There’s a whole bunch of logic we’ve started playing with — the velocity checks when a device changes, the amount spent over a month, and so on. It gives us much more confidence that we can safeguard our customers’ accounts long-term. We’ve reduced account takeovers by 30%.”






Daniel Martinez



Head of Operations, Rebtel





Read story












“With SEON, we immediately improved how we monitor login and account activity, which cut our chargeback rates by 50%. Before, identifying an account takeover took days, costing our customers and us significantly.”






Joeran Kiencke



Manager Risk Operations, Lottoland





Read story








See all customer stories















Choose How to Integrate with SEON



The choice is up to you: integrate directly with SEON’s APIs or through the AWS Marketplace.




Read the technical docs







Learn More About Login & Activity Monitoring

Explore Our Solutions









Digital Footprint Analysis



Using email, phone, and IP data collected during onboarding, SEON crafts a highly detailed digital footprint of each user so you can detect fraudsters before KYC.




Learn more










AML Screening & Monitoring



Keep your business and your revenue safe with anti-fraud and global AML screening, continuous monitoring, and rule-setting capabilities – together in one platform.




Learn more










AI & Machine Learning



Combat evolving threats with adaptive AI that powers fraud prevention and AML compliance. Gain insights with explainable risk signals, clear investigative summaries and intelligent pattern detection.




Learn more











Take the First Step Toward Transformative Fraud Prevention




“SEON significantly enhanced our fraud prevention efficiency, freeing up time and resources for better policies, procedures and rules.”




Chief Compliance Officer, Soft2Bet




Automate 95% of fraud checks



Reduce fraudulent registrations by 90%



Accelerate manual reviews by 90%








Trusted by 5,000+ global organizations:

This cookie notice (“Cookie Notice”) provides you with information on how SEON Technologies Kft. (“SEON” or “we”) and our social media advertising, analytics, etc. partners use cookies on seon.io and docs.seon.io. Cookies. Cookies are small text files that are sent to your device by the browser upon request of the websites. When this notice mentions cookies it should be understood to include similar technologies (e.g. pixel tags, web beacons, local storage, etc.). The cookies that we provide or set on your device while you are visiting our websites are called first party cookies. The cookies that our partners provide or set on your device are third party cookies. Each cookie lasts for a different period of time. Session cookies will last only while your browser is open. When you close the browser, this cookie will be deleted automatically. Persistent cookies will survive even after closing the browser. For example, we will recognize your device via these cookies when you open the browser again. Further information about cookies. Learn more about the purposes of cookies, the duration of the operation of cookies, our social media, advertising, analytics, etc. partners that use cookies on our websites under “Details”. Data collected about you. We and our partners process the cookie ID and related data such as information about your device, the functioning of our website, your preferences etc. Please note that normally we are not able to identify you based on these data, therefore they are normally not considered personal data. If, on the basis of specific circumstances, we are able to identify you based on these data, we inform you that we process your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Notice. Recipients. SEON shares the cookie ID and related data with the following recipients: cloud providers, customer relationship management (CRM) providers, integration tool providers, instant messaging providers, video conferencing tool providers, UI/UX tool providers, social media providers, online advertising platforms and agencies, marketing and analytics tools providers. For further information about our data sharing practices please see our Privacy Notice. Your choices. We use “Functionality and Preferences”, “Personalization and Marketing” and “Statistics” cookies on the basis of you consent. You can at any time, provide, change or withdraw your consent from these cookies under “Details”. Please note that our use of “Necessary” cookies is not subject to your consent, we use them by default, as without these cookies, our website functions requested by you do not work. Device fingerprinting. We use device fingerprinting technology for ensuring information security of our services and for preventing frauds. For further information please see our Privacy Notice. Further information about our privacy practices. Our Privacy Notice complements this Cookie Notice. Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us or our data protection officer, how we process personal data, what  are your rights regarding your personal data, and what are our data protection and privacy practices in our Privacy Notice.   Do not sell or share my personal informationNecessary Cookies Only Allow Selection Customize Accept All Cookies

Account Takeovers




Catch Fraudsters in Real Time





Identify suspicious logins and activity to stop unauthorized transfers, account information changes and fraudulent transactions – automatically.





Speak with an expert






Improve Account Security for Genuine Customers




Automatically pinpoint suspicious activity and usage patterns at scale



Continuously monitor user behavior to detect and block unauthorized access attempts



Proactively stop account takeovers to improve your customer account protection strategies





See how device intelligence prevents ATOs







Reduce Fraud while Improving Team Efficiency




Improve decision-making and evolve your protection strategies by tapping into deep user behavior insights



Implement AI-suggested rules to automatically prevent unauthorized transfers, account changes and fraudulent transactions in real time



Reduce your team’s manual review workload so they can concentrate on other critical tasks





How to detect fraud using machine learning







Protect Your Business and Build Trust at the Same Time




Boost your business’ reputation by proactively eliminating account takeover threats



Build trust with customers by protecting their accounts from unauthorized access and fraud



Strengthen customer loyalty by consistently providing them with secure and reliable user experiences





Learn how to prevent account takeovers in real time








Discover How Companies Win











“What’s really cool is the way you can set up rules. There is a whole bunch of logic that we’ve just started playing with – the velocity checks when you change the device, the amount spent over a month, and so on. It gives us much more confidence that we can safeguard our customers’ accounts in the long run.”






Daniel Martinez



Head of Operations, Rebtel





Read story












“SEON shows you how much fraud is on the market, and with their help, you can reduce it. Working in real time is a key difference, and to top it off, the customer support is excellent; getting an answer very quickly, in easy-to-understand terms with examples – this is what I expect from a solution.”






Joeran Kiencke



Manager Risk Operations, Lottoland





Read story








See all customer stories















Choose How to Integrate with SEON



The choice is up to you: integrate directly with SEON’s APIs or through the AWS Marketplace.




Read the technical docs







Learn More About Account Takeovers







Article

Account Takeover Fraud (ATO): What Is It & How to Detect It


Learn how to detect and prevent account takeover fraud using advanced tools like device fingerprinting and behavior analysis. 




Article

New Account Fraud: What It Is and How to Prevent It


Explore what new account fraud is, how it impacts your business, and what you can do to prevent it 




Article

Account Takeover Risk Assessment: How It Works and Best Practices


Account takeover risk assessments are key to ensuring you are not vulnerable to ATO attacks. 




Article

Account Takeover Alerts: When to Flag Suspicious Logins


Here’s why you need a robust alert system for account takeovers. 







Explore Our Solutions









Fraud Prevention



SEON’s fraud prevention solution connects 900+ first-party data signals to detect, stop and prevent fraud in real time across your entire customer journey.




Learn more










Digital Footprint



By analyzing email, phone, and IP data in real time, SEON builds detailed digital footprints to flag fraudsters before KYC checks.




Learn more










AI & Machine Learning



Fight evolving threats with adaptive AI that powers fraud and AML compliance, delivering explainable risk signals and pattern insights.




Learn more











Take the First Step Toward Transformative Fraud Prevention




“SEON significantly enhanced our fraud prevention efficiency, freeing up time and resources for better policies, procedures and rules.”




Chief Compliance Officer, Soft2Bet




Automate 95% of fraud checks



Reduce fraudulent registrations by 90%



Accelerate manual reviews by 90%








Trusted by 5,000+ global organizations:
























Book Time With Our Experts

This cookie notice (“Cookie Notice”) provides you with information on how SEON Technologies Kft. (“SEON” or “we”) and our social media advertising, analytics, etc. partners use cookies on seon.io and docs.seon.io. Cookies. Cookies are small text files that are sent to your device by the browser upon request of the websites. When this notice mentions cookies it should be understood to include similar technologies (e.g. pixel tags, web beacons, local storage, etc.). The cookies that we provide or set on your device while you are visiting our websites are called first party cookies. The cookies that our partners provide or set on your device are third party cookies. Each cookie lasts for a different period of time. Session cookies will last only while your browser is open. When you close the browser, this cookie will be deleted automatically. Persistent cookies will survive even after closing the browser. For example, we will recognize your device via these cookies when you open the browser again. Further information about cookies. Learn more about the purposes of cookies, the duration of the operation of cookies, our social media, advertising, analytics, etc. partners that use cookies on our websites under “Details”. Data collected about you. We and our partners process the cookie ID and related data such as information about your device, the functioning of our website, your preferences etc. Please note that normally we are not able to identify you based on these data, therefore they are normally not considered personal data. If, on the basis of specific circumstances, we are able to identify you based on these data, we inform you that we process your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Notice. Recipients. SEON shares the cookie ID and related data with the following recipients: cloud providers, customer relationship management (CRM) providers, integration tool providers, instant messaging providers, video conferencing tool providers, UI/UX tool providers, social media providers, online advertising platforms and agencies, marketing and analytics tools providers. For further information about our data sharing practices please see our Privacy Notice. Your choices. We use “Functionality and Preferences”, “Personalization and Marketing” and “Statistics” cookies on the basis of you consent. You can at any time, provide, change or withdraw your consent from these cookies under “Details”. Please note that our use of “Necessary” cookies is not subject to your consent, we use them by default, as without these cookies, our website functions requested by you do not work. Device fingerprinting. We use device fingerprinting technology for ensuring information security of our services and for preventing frauds. For further information please see our Privacy Notice. Further information about our privacy practices. Our Privacy Notice complements this Cookie Notice. Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us or our data protection officer, how we process personal data, what  are your rights regarding your personal data, and what are our data protection and privacy practices in our Privacy Notice.   Do not sell or share my personal informationNecessary Cookies Only Allow Selection Customize Accept All Cookies

Registration & Onboarding




Onboard Customers, Not Fraudsters





Filter out fraudsters in real time so genuine customers can register and onboard – quickly and smoothly.





Speak with an expert






Reduce Fraudulent Signups




Identify and block registrations using synthetic or stolen identities – including bots and organized fraud rings



Reduce false positives to onboard genuine clients with greater accuracy



Strike the right balance between keeping your business secure and delivering a frictionless user experience





Read up on onboarding best practices







Take a Dynamic Approach




Implement dynamic friction so genuine customers can onboard smoothly, while risky customers go through KYC checks



Use alternative data signals to onboard customers faster



Set up automatic screening and monitoring rules to meet your unique compliance requirements





Learn more about using dynamic friction







Onboard Smarter with Digital Footprint Analysis




Instantly piece together detailed digital profiles for each customer using their email, phone number and IP data



Automatically block fraudulent users that don’t meet your standards with custom rules



Implement AI-suggested rules to keep bad actors out





See how digital footprint analysis can help







Uncover Hidden Customer Relationships




With more context, you can act faster and spot multiple linked customers using network analysis



Detect fraud and money laundering rings alongside bonus abuse, multi-accounting and synthetic identities



Automatically surface identical, highly similar and associated accounts using shared devices, IP addresses, behavioral patterns and more





Learn about Network Analysis








Discover How Companies Win











“SEON’s digital footprint insights enabled us to improve approval rates for our customers by 5%, significantly enhancing our ability to onboard new customers quickly. This also allowed us to expand our customer base and increase revenue streams while effectively managing credit risk, resulting in notable ROI for our organization.”






Costin Mincovici



Chief Credit Officer, tbi Bank





Read story












“Integrating SEON’s digital footprint tools into our KYC process allowed us to implement dynamic friction, triggering additional checks only when needed. For instance, if SEON shows no social media presence is linked to an email, the fraud score increases, prompting extra KYC questions. This approach reduces our KYC costs and helps us screen customers efficiently.”






Kaspars Magaznieks



Head of Fraud, Sun Finance





Read story








See all customer stories















Choose How to Integrate with SEON



The choice is up to you: integrate directly with SEON’s APIs or through the AWS Marketplace.




Read the technical docs







Learn More About Digital Onboarding







Guide

Onboarding Risk Reduction in Digital Banking


Download our free guide to secure efficient digital bank onboarding and tackle evolving fraud risks. 




Article

How to Secure Digital Onboarding in iGaming


Digital onboarding in iGaming made secure. Prevent bonus abuse & fake signups while keeping player signup smooth and instant. 




Case study

Digital Bank HYPE Reduces Onboarding Costs with SEON


See how Hype boosted onboarding with SEON, cutting fraud, costs, and achieving a 90.6% auto-approval rate through smarter risk management. 




Case study

Félix Improves Onboarding and Fraud Prevention with SEON


Read how Félix cut fraud to nearly 0% and boosted trust with SEON’s seamless, secure onboarding solutions. 




Guide

Digital Onboarding: How It Works, Tools & Solutions


Onboarding users to your organization’s website, app or eshop: everything you need to know. 







Explore Related Screening Solutions









AML Transaction Monitoring



AML transaction monitoring solution with real-time detection, customizable rules, and built-in investigations and reporting.




Learn more










Fraud Prevention



SEON’s fraud prevention solution connects 900+ first-party data signals to detect, stop and prevent fraud in real time across your entire customer journey.




Learn more










Customer Screening



Use advanced fraud signals to screen and block high-risk customers before AML checks, and automate global screening and ongoing monitoring, all in real time through a single API.




Learn more











Take the First Step Toward Transformative Fraud Prevention




“SEON significantly enhanced our fraud prevention efficiency, freeing up time and resources for better policies, procedures and rules.”




Chief Compliance Officer, Soft2Bet




Automate 95% of fraud checks



Reduce fraudulent registrations by 90%



Accelerate manual reviews by 90%








Trusted by 5,000+ global organizations:
























Book Time With Our Experts

This cookie notice (“Cookie Notice”) provides you with information on how SEON Technologies Kft. (“SEON” or “we”) and our social media advertising, analytics, etc. partners use cookies on seon.io and docs.seon.io. Cookies. Cookies are small text files that are sent to your device by the browser upon request of the websites. When this notice mentions cookies it should be understood to include similar technologies (e.g. pixel tags, web beacons, local storage, etc.). The cookies that we provide or set on your device while you are visiting our websites are called first party cookies. The cookies that our partners provide or set on your device are third party cookies. Each cookie lasts for a different period of time. Session cookies will last only while your browser is open. When you close the browser, this cookie will be deleted automatically. Persistent cookies will survive even after closing the browser. For example, we will recognize your device via these cookies when you open the browser again. Further information about cookies. Learn more about the purposes of cookies, the duration of the operation of cookies, our social media, advertising, analytics, etc. partners that use cookies on our websites under “Details”. Data collected about you. We and our partners process the cookie ID and related data such as information about your device, the functioning of our website, your preferences etc. Please note that normally we are not able to identify you based on these data, therefore they are normally not considered personal data. If, on the basis of specific circumstances, we are able to identify you based on these data, we inform you that we process your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Notice. Recipients. SEON shares the cookie ID and related data with the following recipients: cloud providers, customer relationship management (CRM) providers, integration tool providers, instant messaging providers, video conferencing tool providers, UI/UX tool providers, social media providers, online advertising platforms and agencies, marketing and analytics tools providers. For further information about our data sharing practices please see our Privacy Notice. Your choices. We use “Functionality and Preferences”, “Personalization and Marketing” and “Statistics” cookies on the basis of you consent. You can at any time, provide, change or withdraw your consent from these cookies under “Details”. Please note that our use of “Necessary” cookies is not subject to your consent, we use them by default, as without these cookies, our website functions requested by you do not work. Device fingerprinting. We use device fingerprinting technology for ensuring information security of our services and for preventing frauds. For further information please see our Privacy Notice. Further information about our privacy practices. Our Privacy Notice complements this Cookie Notice. Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us or our data protection officer, how we process personal data, what  are your rights regarding your personal data, and what are our data protection and privacy practices in our Privacy Notice.   Do not sell or share my personal informationNecessary Cookies Only Allow Selection Customize Accept All Cookies

About Us




Our Mission





SEON’s mission is to redefine global fraud prevention by safeguarding the entire customer journey, allowing businesses to operate confidently and stay ahead of evolving risks.







Founding story




Born from Fraud, Built to Fight It




SEON was born from the determination of co-founders Tamas Kadar and Bence Jendruszak. While building a cryptocurrency startup, they faced relentless fraud attacks that threatened the company’s survival. Frustrated by slow, complex anti-fraud tools that hurt user experience, they set out to build something radically different: an agile, transparent, data-rich platform capable of stopping fraud without blocking growth.



Nearly a decade later, SEON protects over 5,000 businesses globally and has prevented more than $300 billion in fraud losses. With a team of 300+ fraud experts across the Americas, EMEA and Asia-Pacific, SEON combines world-class engineering with deep industry insight.



Powered by more than 900 real-time, first-party data signals and an adaptable AI rules engine, SEON is the command center for real-time risk and AML decision-making, helping businesses detect hidden threats, automate compliance and deliver seamless customer experiences. From fintech and payments to eCommerce and iGaming, SEON enables teams to move fast without compromising security.

When you join SEON, you’ll work with a growing team to make a big impact. We’re always looking for passionate, curious and empathetic people to join our team. Come work alongside a group of talented individuals who are driven to deliver great customer outcomes.

This cookie notice (“Cookie Notice”) provides you with information on how SEON Technologies Kft. (“SEON” or “we”) and our social media advertising, analytics, etc. partners use cookies on seon.io and docs.seon.io. Cookies. Cookies are small text files that are sent to your device by the browser upon request of the websites. When this notice mentions cookies it should be understood to include similar technologies (e.g. pixel tags, web beacons, local storage, etc.). The cookies that we provide or set on your device while you are visiting our websites are called first party cookies. The cookies that our partners provide or set on your device are third party cookies. Each cookie lasts for a different period of time. Session cookies will last only while your browser is open. When you close the browser, this cookie will be deleted automatically. Persistent cookies will survive even after closing the browser. For example, we will recognize your device via these cookies when you open the browser again. Further information about cookies. Learn more about the purposes of cookies, the duration of the operation of cookies, our social media, advertising, analytics, etc. partners that use cookies on our websites under “Details”. Data collected about you. We and our partners process the cookie ID and related data such as information about your device, the functioning of our website, your preferences etc. Please note that normally we are not able to identify you based on these data, therefore they are normally not considered personal data. If, on the basis of specific circumstances, we are able to identify you based on these data, we inform you that we process your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Notice. Recipients. SEON shares the cookie ID and related data with the following recipients: cloud providers, customer relationship management (CRM) providers, integration tool providers, instant messaging providers, video conferencing tool providers, UI/UX tool providers, social media providers, online advertising platforms and agencies, marketing and analytics tools providers. For further information about our data sharing practices please see our Privacy Notice. Your choices. We use “Functionality and Preferences”, “Personalization and Marketing” and “Statistics” cookies on the basis of you consent. You can at any time, provide, change or withdraw your consent from these cookies under “Details”. Please note that our use of “Necessary” cookies is not subject to your consent, we use them by default, as without these cookies, our website functions requested by you do not work. Device fingerprinting. We use device fingerprinting technology for ensuring information security of our services and for preventing frauds. For further information please see our Privacy Notice. Further information about our privacy practices. Our Privacy Notice complements this Cookie Notice. Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us or our data protection officer, how we process personal data, what  are your rights regarding your personal data, and what are our data protection and privacy practices in our Privacy Notice.   Do not sell or share my personal informationNecessary Cookies Only Allow Selection Customize Accept All Cookies

This cookie notice (“Cookie Notice”) provides you with information on how SEON Technologies Kft. (“SEON” or “we”) and our social media advertising, analytics, etc. partners use cookies on seon.io and docs.seon.io. Cookies. Cookies are small text files that are sent to your device by the browser upon request of the websites. When this notice mentions cookies it should be understood to include similar technologies (e.g. pixel tags, web beacons, local storage, etc.). The cookies that we provide or set on your device while you are visiting our websites are called first party cookies. The cookies that our partners provide or set on your device are third party cookies. Each cookie lasts for a different period of time. Session cookies will last only while your browser is open. When you close the browser, this cookie will be deleted automatically. Persistent cookies will survive even after closing the browser. For example, we will recognize your device via these cookies when you open the browser again. Further information about cookies. Learn more about the purposes of cookies, the duration of the operation of cookies, our social media, advertising, analytics, etc. partners that use cookies on our websites under “Details”. Data collected about you. We and our partners process the cookie ID and related data such as information about your device, the functioning of our website, your preferences etc. Please note that normally we are not able to identify you based on these data, therefore they are normally not considered personal data. If, on the basis of specific circumstances, we are able to identify you based on these data, we inform you that we process your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Notice. Recipients. SEON shares the cookie ID and related data with the following recipients: cloud providers, customer relationship management (CRM) providers, integration tool providers, instant messaging providers, video conferencing tool providers, UI/UX tool providers, social media providers, online advertising platforms and agencies, marketing and analytics tools providers. For further information about our data sharing practices please see our Privacy Notice. Your choices. We use “Functionality and Preferences”, “Personalization and Marketing” and “Statistics” cookies on the basis of you consent. You can at any time, provide, change or withdraw your consent from these cookies under “Details”. Please note that our use of “Necessary” cookies is not subject to your consent, we use them by default, as without these cookies, our website functions requested by you do not work. Device fingerprinting. We use device fingerprinting technology for ensuring information security of our services and for preventing frauds. For further information please see our Privacy Notice. Further information about our privacy practices. Our Privacy Notice complements this Cookie Notice. Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us or our data protection officer, how we process personal data, what  are your rights regarding your personal data, and what are our data protection and privacy practices in our Privacy Notice.   Do not sell or share my personal informationNecessary Cookies Only Allow Selection Customize Accept All Cookies

Careers




Join Our Fraud Fighting Team





When you join SEON, you’ll work with a growing team to make a big impact. We’re always looking for passionate, curious and empathetic people to join our team. Come work alongside a group of talented individuals who are driven to deliver great customer outcomes.







Join Our Team



Life at SEON



At SEON, we strive to help online businesses reduce the cost, time and challenges faced due to fraud. Whether you are a global financial leader or a small eCommerce startup, our solution simplifies fraud management so you can focus on what matters: growing and scaling your company.The people of SEON encourage open communication, do not believe in hierarchy and are all for transparency. By joining our Fraud Fighting team, you will be encouraged to offer creative and or innovative ideas that can drive the company forward. This is THE place for you if you want to be part of a customer obsessed, resilient and humble company that puts innovation at the center of what we do.




See open positions













2017



founded









$187mn



in funding









290+



team members







Our Perks



Our team is committed to fighting fraud on a daily basis, and as a result, we take great pride in offering our people fair compensation. Here are some further insights into our way of life:









ESOP



Employee stock ownership plan. 









Vacation



National holidays, generous holiday allowance 









Flexible hours



Flexible work schedule that allows teammates to alter their workday.









Enhanced parental leave



Enhanced parental leave policies for all the parents on the team.









Private health insurance



Private health insurance including coverage for spouse and dependents.









Hybrid working environment



We encourage our colleagues to work from home a few days per week, and spend the rest of the time in the office collaborating with the SEON team.









Employee assistance and mental health support



Access to an employee assistance and mental health support platform.









Lunch and breakfast 



Monthly company breakfast and weekly lunch allowance.









Learning and development



Access to a variety of opportunities for learning and development (including external L&D).









Weekly language courses



You can learn 40+ languages including Hungarian, English, Spanish, Portuguese & Bahasa.









Book allowance



You can order business books to grow your knowledge and support your curiosity to learn more.






See open positions












“What keeps me coming to work is the knowledge that the work we do at SEON is making a real difference in the world. Every day, we’re tackling complex challenges in fraud prevention, protecting businesses and their customers from financial threats. The sense of purpose and the dynamic, innovative team I get to work with inspire me to continue pushing the boundaries of what we can achieve together.”

Emily Light, Head of Implementation








Open Positions



At SEON, we empower our team to grow and succeed on impactful projects. If you’re ready to elevate your career with a supportive, collaborative team, explore our open roles and find where your future can thrive with us!













Our Core Values

















We’re driven by Trust & Transparency, Customer Obsession, Innovation, and Ownership. We keep our word, act with integrity, and learn from every experience. Customers guide us, and we deliver with empathy, urgency, and unity. We embrace bold ideas, never settle, and iterate for impact. Together, we take ownership and drive meaningful solutions.





Our Offices




We have a presence in the USA, UK, Hungary and Indonesia.

This cookie notice (“Cookie Notice”) provides you with information on how SEON Technologies Kft. (“SEON” or “we”) and our social media advertising, analytics, etc. partners use cookies on seon.io and docs.seon.io. Cookies. Cookies are small text files that are sent to your device by the browser upon request of the websites. When this notice mentions cookies it should be understood to include similar technologies (e.g. pixel tags, web beacons, local storage, etc.). The cookies that we provide or set on your device while you are visiting our websites are called first party cookies. The cookies that our partners provide or set on your device are third party cookies. Each cookie lasts for a different period of time. Session cookies will last only while your browser is open. When you close the browser, this cookie will be deleted automatically. Persistent cookies will survive even after closing the browser. For example, we will recognize your device via these cookies when you open the browser again. Further information about cookies. Learn more about the purposes of cookies, the duration of the operation of cookies, our social media, advertising, analytics, etc. partners that use cookies on our websites under “Details”. Data collected about you. We and our partners process the cookie ID and related data such as information about your device, the functioning of our website, your preferences etc. Please note that normally we are not able to identify you based on these data, therefore they are normally not considered personal data. If, on the basis of specific circumstances, we are able to identify you based on these data, we inform you that we process your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Notice. Recipients. SEON shares the cookie ID and related data with the following recipients: cloud providers, customer relationship management (CRM) providers, integration tool providers, instant messaging providers, video conferencing tool providers, UI/UX tool providers, social media providers, online advertising platforms and agencies, marketing and analytics tools providers. For further information about our data sharing practices please see our Privacy Notice. Your choices. We use “Functionality and Preferences”, “Personalization and Marketing” and “Statistics” cookies on the basis of you consent. You can at any time, provide, change or withdraw your consent from these cookies under “Details”. Please note that our use of “Necessary” cookies is not subject to your consent, we use them by default, as without these cookies, our website functions requested by you do not work. Device fingerprinting. We use device fingerprinting technology for ensuring information security of our services and for preventing frauds. For further information please see our Privacy Notice. Further information about our privacy practices. Our Privacy Notice complements this Cookie Notice.
